original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Railway Station Masters have been on strike since midnight yesterday (09).

President of the Railway Station Masters' Association, Sumedha Somaratne, says that the strike is being carried out based on the issue of appointing an officer to the position of Deputy General Manager of Railways in charge of commercial activities.
When inquired in this regard, the Deputy General Manager of Railways M. J. Idipolage said that trains are scheduled to run today according to the schedule.
Imran Khan’s Arrest Triggers Widespread Protests Across Pakistan Amid Political Turmoil
Sri Lanka requests debt treatment in first bilateral committee meeting, says Paris Club
X-Press Pearl case postponed to 15th May, says AG Department
Former President Donald Trump found guilty of sexual assault in civil suit
